decisions.description: Process: Comm Conn sales stage update date
decisions.name: Community_Connections_Oppty_Stage_Changed
decisions.label: Community Connections Oppty Stage Changed?

decisions.name: Is_ClosedDate_changed_with_Greater_value
decisions.label: Is ClosedDate changed with Greater value?

decisions.name: Is_Opportunity_Closed_Won_or_Closed_Lost
decisions.label: Is Opportunity Closed Won or Closed Lost?

rules.name: ClosedWonorClosedLost
rules.conditionLogic: (3 AND (1 OR 2)) OR ( Not(3) AND (1 OR 2) AND (4 AND 5))
rules.label: Yes

decisions.description: Process: Seer status updated to new
decisions.name: Is_Partner_Opportunity
decisions.label: Is Partner Opportunity?

decisions.description: Process: Seer status updated to new
decisions.name: Is_Product_Selected
decisions.label: Is Product Selected?

rules.name: YesProductIsSelected
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND ( 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 )
rules.label: Yes

rules.name: SeerIsAssigned
rules.conditionLogic: ( 1 AND 2 AND 3 ) OR ( NOT ( 1 ) AND ( ( 2 AND 4 ) OR ( 3 AND 5 ) ) )
rules.label: Yes

decisions.name: Is_stage_changed_to_ClosedWon_for_OppLightning
decisions.label: Is stage changed to ClosedWon for OppLightning?

decisions.name: Master_Agent_is_changed_or_not_null
decisions.label: Master Agent is changed or not null?

formulas.name: varForGreggWells
formulas.expression: ({!varCurrentUserProfile} = 'Partner Support Team' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#CTF Small Business User' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#Alternate Channel Manager' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#Alternate Channel Leadership' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#CTF Customer Service Analyst') && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Connecticut') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Delaware') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Indiana') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Massachusetts') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Maryland') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Maine') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Hampshire') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Jersey') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New York') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Ohio') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Pennsylvania') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Rhode Island') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Virginia') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Vermont'))

formulas.name: varForJayBass
formulas.expression: ({!varCurrentUserProfile} = 'Partner Support Team' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#CTF Small Business User' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#Alternate Channel Manager' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#Alternate Channel Leadership' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#CTF Customer Service Analyst') && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Florida') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Georgia') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'North Carolina') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'South Carolina') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Tennessee') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'West Virginia'))

formulas.name: varForMarcyLimatola
formulas.expression: ({!varCurrentUserProfile} = 'Partner Support Team' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#CTF Small Business User' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#Alternate Channel Manager' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#Alternate Channel Leadership' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#CTF Customer Service Analyst') && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Alaska') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Colorado') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Kansas') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Missouri') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'North Dakota') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'South Dakota') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Utah') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Wyoming') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'California') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Arizona') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Iowa') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Nebraska') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Nevada'))

formulas.name: varForThomasJeffries
formulas.expression: ({!varCurrentUserProfile} = 'Partner Support Team' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#CTF Small Business User' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#Alternate Channel Manager' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#Alternate Channel Leadership' || {!varCurrentUserProfile} = '#CTF Customer Service Analyst') && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Alabama') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Arkansas') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Illinois') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Kentucky') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Louisiana') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Michigan') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Mississippi') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Mexico') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Oklahoma') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Wisconsin') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Minnesota') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Texas'))

formulas.name: varPortalGreggWells
formulas.expression: ({!varCurrentUserProfile} = 'Frontier Partner Portal User' && {!$Record.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Partner_Opportunity_New'}) && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Connecticut') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Delaware') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Indiana') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Massachusetts') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Maryland') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Maine') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Hampshire') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New Jersey') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'New York') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Ohio') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Pennsylvania') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Rhode Island') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Virginia') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Vermont'))

formulas.name: varPortalJayBass
formulas.expression: ({!varCurrentUserProfile} = 'Frontier Partner Portal User' && {!$Record.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Partner_Opportunity_New'}) && (ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Florida') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Georgia') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'North Carolina') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'South Carolina') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'Tennessee') || ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Local_Area_Market_State__c}, 'West Virginia'))
